mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT EVENT_ID, LABEL, IMAGE, ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY EVENT_ID) RN FROM EVENT_BANNERS ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{page.start} AND #{page.end}
SELECT EB.IMAGE, EB.CATEGORY, EB.LABEL, E.EVENT_ID FROM EVENT_BANNERS EB JOIN EVENTS E ON EB.EVENT_ID = E.EVENT_ID WHERE EB.EVENT_ID = #{event_id}
SELECT I.ITEM_ID, I.LABEL, EI.EVENT_ID, II."PATH" FROM EVENT_ITEMS EI JOIN ITEMS I ON I.ITEM_ID = EI.ITEM_ID JOIN ITEM_IMAGES II ON II.ITEM_ID = EI.ITEM_ID
